faq.question: How to add new favourite?
faq.answer:
You can add new favourite by 2 ways.

1)Repeat the text and add as favourite
•Enter repeat text
•Enter how many times you want to repeat the text
•Choose type of spacing (From list or own)
•Click start repeating button
•After successfully repeated click on the Favourite button

2)Directly add new favourite
•Click Favourite List icon button at the right bottom
•Click add favourite icon button at the right bottom
•Enter repeat text
•Enter how many times you want to repeat the text
•Choose type of spacing (From list or own)
•Click add favourite button

faq.question: How to add new quick access in widget?
faq.answer:
You can add quick access in widget by 2 ways.

1)From favourite
•Long press on othe favourite list. A dialog will allow you add the particular favourite in quick access

2)Directly add new quick access
•Click Quick Access List icon button at the left bottom
•Click add quick access icon button at the right bottom
•Enter repeat text
•Enter how many times you want to repeat the text
•Choose type of spacing (From list or own)
•Click the add quick access widget button

faq.question: How to use quick access widget?
faq.answer:
You have to enable the Draw Over Other Apps permission. Otherwise you can't able to use this feature.

•Click Quick Access List icon button at the left bottom.You will be redirected to quick access widget page.
•Click on the enable radio button.

You can copy the repeated text by long pressing on list item.

faq.question: How to copy repeated text in quick access widget?
faq.answer: Long press on list item to copy the repeated text

faq.question: What are all the limitations ?
faq.answer:
You can repeat the text upto 1,20,000 characters to use this app features like copy, share, quick access widget.
(i.e)If your repeat text length 10 and spacing text length 1 and your repeat count should be maximum upto 10000. Then only you can use all the features of this app like copy, share, add favourite.

If you want to repeat more than 1,20,000 character repeated text , you can repeat the text by using this app but you have to copy the repeated text manually and paste it anywhere
